description: Episode of Series "Man Alive". Documents the problems and dangers of infant formula marketing and bottle-feeding in the third world. Highlights the efforts of government health workers and church organisations to challenge the practices of multinational corporations who are irresponsible and somewhat aggressive in their promotion of formula and their chase for profits. Focuses on Nestles, the world's largest producer of baby formula. Presented by Roy Bonisteel. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
